values.value: Patients who are not on anti-diabetes drugs or are on low risk hypoglycemic drugs are eligible for 200 strips annually; patients who are on high risk hypoglycemic drugs are eligible for 400 strips annually. Special Authority is not required for patients within the above parameters. A Special Authority form for 100 Additional Test Strips has been attached if required for future requests. Please see additional information on the PharmaCare website (medical supplies subsection) for more information. www.gov.bc.ca/pharmacare/bloodglucoseteststrips.html
